Class ZoweRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • rest.ZoweRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonDeleteRequest, JsonGetRequest, JsonPostRequest, JsonPutRequest, StreamGetRequest, TextGetRequest, TextPutRequest
    public abstract class ZoweRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Base abstract class that conforms to Http CRUD operations
